Narrative.situation: The team identified a need to develop a new project management tool to streamline workflows and improve collaboration across departments.
Narrative.currentState: The project is in the development phase, with several tasks completed, including planning and database setup, which is 50% complete.
Narrative.plan: The team plans to complete the remaining development tasks, conduct thorough testing, and deploy the tool by the end of April 2025.
Narrative.results: Results will be evaluated post-launch, focusing on user adoption rates and productivity improvements.
